pages.text: 53|1|Yi mo luo shi de xingsu mengshi,
53|2|nimen de pengyou, ji bu mi wu, you wei mixin,
53|3|ye wei sui siyu er yan.
53|4|Zhe zhishi tasuo shou de qishi,
53|5|jiaoshou ta de, shi na qiangjian de,
53|6|youli de, gu ta dadao quanmei.
53|7|Ta zai dongfang de zuigao chu,
53|8|ranhou ta jianjian jiejin er jiangdi,
53|9|ta xiangju liang zhanggong de changdu, huo geng jin yixie.
53|10|Ta ba tasuo ying shou qishi, qishi gei ta de puren,
53|11|ta de xin meiyou fouren ta suo jian de.
53|12|Nandao nimen yao wei ta suo jian de er yu ta zhenglun ma?
53|13|Ta que yi jian ta er ci xiajiang,
53|14|zai ji jing de suanzao shu pang,
53|15|na li you guisu de leyuan.
53|16|Dang suanzao shu meng shang yi ceng dongxi de shihou,
53|17|yan wei xie shi, ye wei guofen;
53|18|ta que yi kanjian ta de zhu de yibufen zuida de jixiang.
53|19|Nimen gaosu wo ba! La te he ou sa,
53|20|yiji paihang di san, yeshi zui ci de mo na, zenme shi an la de nu'er ne?
53|21|Nandao nanhai gui nimen, nuhai que gui an la ma?
53|22|Ran'er, zhe shi bu gongping de fenpei.
53|23|Zhexie ouxiang zhishi nimen he nimen de zuxian suoding de mingcheng, an la bing wei jiayi zhengshi, tamen zhishi ping caixiang he siyu. Zhengdao que yi cong tamen de zhu jianglin tamen.
53|24|Nandao ren xiwang shenme jiu you she me?
53|25|Houshi he jinshi, dou shi an la de.
53|26|Tianshang de xuduo tianshi, tamen de shuo qing, hao wu biyi, chufei zai an la xuke tamen wei ta suo yiyu he suo xiyue zhe shuo qing zhihou,
